reviewText: If you like naked teen girls, this is the set to get, volumes 1-13. Some reviewers here stated that these are women pretending to be young girls. Not true!  The age of consent in germany is 14, not 18. that said the dvd's are corny, not so well acted and basically, don't have much of a plot - but the girls are adorable, lol

This is a pseudo-documentary about a new sexual education guide published in Germany to help boys and girls understand and enjoy a healthy sex life. Or it is an excuse for several women to strip naked on camera while pretending to be young girls.

Actually the movie quickly drops the idea of the sexual education guide and moves on with several girls (actually women) setting around discussing sexual exploits and while doing so the sexual scenarios are acted out. It usually stops short of the actual sex, but girls (again women pretending to be girls) are seen nude in every scenario, and boys (men with one exception which will be addressed later)are seen nude in some. There is also a lot of fondling of breasts and butts. There are a few sex scenes, but unlike the nudity and fondling they are under covers, in poor lighting etc.

This movie does show a perspective on some of the situations which are generally not discussed in the media. It has a rape victim who is told no one will believe her and she will be expelled it she reports the rape; it also has a school girl who seduces a classmate's father then cries rape when her parents find out (the narrator in the movie strongly supports the idea that the man was not guilty of anything); and it has school girls who do not wish to testify against their teacher because they like him and enjoyed the sexual contact with him. Generally speaking the situations are simplified in some ways yet exaggerated in others, both leading to more nudity and sex play. There is only one male who is not easily seduced. Overall the movie was entertaining and even humorous in places, although I am not sure they intended it to be humorous in all the places it was humorous.

Amazon.com has at least two versions of this movie and I first reviewed the one which is eighteen minutes shorter than the other. I noticed after uploading the review that it was posted on both versions so I am now rewriting that review to cover both version.

As for the missing eighteen minutes in the seventy-nine minute version:
It completely omits an incest scenario in which a girl seduces her father.
About half of a scenario in which a girl tries to seduce her younger cousin is omitted.
Both rape scenarios have drastic cuts.
And in the scenario mentioned above in which the narrator supports the idea that the man seduced by his son's classmate was not guilty of anything, that comment is omitted.

One last thing worth mentioning. In the scenario with a girl trying to seduce her younger cousin, he does not show up at all in the cut version and the way it is cut the scenario appears to be about a father catching his daughter masturbating, but strangely the father is not actually seen. This is the scenario I referred to earlier where there is actually a minor playing a role in the scenario. The cousin was ten years old according to the story line, but while the actor I am sure was more than ten I am also sure he was still a minor. He is not involved in any sexual activity, but he is seen in full frontal nudity.

Good plot , lots of nudity-depends on what you like in the school reports.
this one to my opinion,one of the better ones, if not the best.
THIS MOVIE WAS OK FOR A HARD "R" TITLE, BUT UNCUT SHOULD HAVE MORE OF AN "X" RATED CONTENT.
